title: Which Xiaomi phone supports 5G networks? - Quora

response.answer_text: Redmi phones mostly support our financial condition were they make value for money phones at best prices. Talking about 5G they have made any phone which supports 5G but in future they will launch 5G phones in mid range price and again they will help and support our financial condition to buy 5G phone.
If that phone comes with 5G modem then it supports 5G. Usually flagship phones will have. Nowadays they launch specifically with 5g version so you can find in market easily.
